newsitem.title: UK: Guinness Jamaica unit to raise 15 mln stg.
newsitem.headline: Guinness Jamaica unit to raise 15 mln stg.

text.p: Guinness Brewing Worldwide, the brewing arm of Guinness Plc announced on Friday that its 51 percent Jamaican subsidiary, Desnoes & Geddes Ltd would raise 15 million stg through a rights issue.
A spokesman for the company said the ratio of the rights and the price would be decided in June, with the issue, if approved by shareholders, scheduled to close on July 21.
The issue will be fully underwritten by Guinness Plc involving a minimum investment of eight million stg and a maximum of 15 million stg.

Guinness had acquired its 51 percent control in Desnoes & Geddes in November 1993. The company is Jamaica's largest brewer with a portfolio which includes Guinness stout, Red Stripe Lager and Desnoes & Geddes soft drinks.
